attributes.action: Consider a bottom up financial aid package.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Instead of providing aid to a high level in the corporate environment, how about writing off all unsecured consumer debt?

This would have the desired effect of increasing consumer spending and feeding the economy through it's natural process rather than applying the current electric shock therapy which does not appear to be working.

To avoid unsecured debt from rising, I would suggest more stringent credit control regulations to ensure a person cannot outstep their means.

I feel confident that this would work.
